title: Maul
content:
r right. From the pump, turn slightly to the right, and you will see "Shabby Wooden Doors". You will need a lock pick check to open the place. Once inside the place, go downstairs and find a "Wooden Trunk", there's the Maul

Maul Notes & Tips

Rarity: Common Value: 30 Gp. Weight: 4.5 Kg. ID: WPN_Maul

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos Flame Blade ♦ Artificial Leech ♦ Assassin
